definitions.definition: A plant raised for some edible part of it, such as the leaves , roots , fruit or flowers , but excluding any plant considered to be a fruit , grain , herb , or spice in the culinary sense.
The edible part of such a plant.
A person whose brain (or, infrequently, whose body ) has been damaged to the point that they cannot interact with the surrounding environment ; a person in a persistent vegetative state .

secondary_definitions: A plant raised for some edible part of it, such as the leaves , roots , fruit or flowers , but excluding any plant considered to be a fruit , grain , herb , or spice in the culinary sense.
The edible part of such a plant.

( figuratively , derogatory ) A person whose brain (or, infrequently, whose body ) has been damaged to the point that they cannot interact with the surrounding environment ; a person in a persistent vegetative state .
( RAF , slang , historical ) A mine ( explosive device ) .
